titleStmt.title: A straunge foot-post vvith a packet full of strange petitions. After a long vacation for a good terme.
titleStmt.author: Nixon, Anthony.

publicationStmt.publisher: By E[dward] A[llde] dwelling neare Christ-Church,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
